help.title: SWGOH-Discord Registration
help.text:
Register your Discord profile agaist your SWGOH profile for access to game-related commands

**Add users to registration**
*%PREFIX%%COMMAND% add help*

**Sync your live data**
*%PREFIX%%COMMAND% update help*

**Registration details**
*%PREFIX%%COMMAND% find help*

**In the case that someone else registers on your allycode, the real account owner can remove the existing registration with their playerId**
*%PREFIX%%COMMAND% remove help*

help.title: SWGOH-Discord Registration
help.text:
Connect a discord user to in-game profile
`------------------------------`
:thinking: indicates the bot is looking for info
:hourglass_flowing_sand: indicates the bot is fetching profile information
:hourglass: indicates the bot is saving your profile details
:white_check_mark: or :x: indicates success or failure of routine

help.title: SWGOH-Discord Update
help.text:
Force a player profile update to live-data
`------------------------------`
:thinking: indicates the bot is looking for info
:hourglass_flowing_sand: indicates the bot is fetching profile information
:hourglass: indicates the bot is saving your profile details
:white_check_mark: or :x: indicates success or failure of routine

help.title: SWGOH-Discord Removal
help.text:
Remove a user registration
**DM this command to the bot to keep your playerId private**

help.title: SWGOH-Discord Lookup
help.text: Find player details to help connect

help.text: Show a player's zeta'd characters

help.text: Show the specific zeta'd abilities for a players character

help.title: SWGOH Player-Unit Zeta Suggestions
help.text:
Show a players next available zeta abilities
Results limited to 7-star, level-85
Ordered by gear-tier

swgoh.title: SWGOH-Discord Registration
swgoh.text:
Register your Discord profile agaist your SWGOH profile for access to game-related commands

:thinking: indicates the bot is looking for info
:hourglass_flowing_sand: indicates the bot is fetching profile information
:hourglass: indicates the bot is saving your profile details
:white_check_mark: or :x: indicates success or failure of routine

**Add user to registration**
*%PREFIX%%COMMAND% add me <allyCode>
%PREFIX%%COMMAND% add <mention|discordId> <allyCode>*

**Sync your live data**
*%PREFIX%%COMMAND% sync [me]
%PREFIX%%COMMAND% sync <mention|discordId|allyCode|IGN>*

**Registration details**
*%PREFIX%%COMMAND% <me|mention|discordId|allyCode|IGN>*

**In the case that someone else registers on your allycode, the real account owner can remove the existing registration with their playerId**
*%PREFIX%%COMMAND% remove <allyCode> <playerId>*

*Note: To keep your playerId private, DM the remove command to the bot - do not post your playerId in the public server*

rss.title: SWGOH-EA Forums Watch
rss.text:
Set up a channel for auto-posting new dev announcements from the SWGOH-EA forums
https://forums.galaxy-of-heroes.starwars.ea.com/

queries.SET_REGISTER: INSERT INTO `swgoh` (`discordId`, `playerId`, `playerName`, `allyCode`, `playerGuild`, `private`) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE `playerName`=VALUES(`playerName`), `playerGuild`=VALUES(`playerGuild`), `updated`=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `private`=VALUES(`private`)
queries.GET_UNITNAMES: SELECT UnitDef.id, REPLACE(udn.text,'"','') as 'name' FROM UnitDef JOIN Localization udn ON udn.id = UnitDef.nameKey AND udn.language = 'ENG_US' WHERE UnitDef.id IN ( ? )
queries.GET_PLAYER_UNIT: SELECT PlayerProfile.name, udn.text as 'unitName', udd.text as 'unitDesc', CASE WHEN Unit.currentRarity LIKE '%SEVEN%' THEN 7 WHEN Unit.currentRarity LIKE '%SIX%' THEN 6 WHEN Unit.currentRarity LIKE '%FIVE%' THEN 5 WHEN Unit.currentRarity LIKE '%FOUR%' THEN 4 WHEN Unit.currentRarity LIKE '%THREE%' THEN 3 WHEN Unit.currentRarity LIKE '%TWO%' THEN 2 WHEN Unit.currentRarity LIKE '%ONE%' THEN 1 END as 'currentRarity', Unit.currentLevel, Unit.currentXp, REPLACE(Unit.currentTier,'TIER_','') as currentTier, UnitDef.forceAlignment, UnitDef.combatType, UnitDef.threatLevel, UnitDef.categoryId, UnitDef.skillReference, UnitDef.primaryUnitStat, UnitTierDef.tier as 'gearTier', UnitTierDef.equipmentSet as 'gearRequired', UnitTierDef.baseStat as 'gearStats' FROM Unit JOIN PlayerProfile ON PlayerProfile.playerId = Unit.playerProfilePlayerId JOIN UnitDef ON UnitDef.id = Unit.definitionId JOIN UnitTierDef ON UnitTierDef.unitDefId = UnitDef.id AND UnitTierDef.tier = Unit.currentTier JOIN Localization udn ON udn.id = UnitDef.nameKey AND udn.language = 'ENG_US' JOIN Localization udd ON udd.id = UnitDef.descKey AND udd.language = 'ENG_US' WHERE PlayerProfile.allyCode = ? AND LOWER(udn.text) LIKE ?
